SELECT DEPT_NAME AS section, devName as equip, SC_PART as part, SC_CONTENT AS spot, RESULT AS value, ID as id, std_value as standard, uploadResultTime as time, ( CASE
WHEN ALTPID = 1 THEN "二级" WHEN ALTPID = 2 THEN "一级" END ) level, (CASE WHEN alarm_flag="N" THEN '未处理' WHEN alarm_flag="Y" THEN '已处理' END) flag FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (ALTPID = 1 OR ALTPID = 2) -- AND alarm_flag='N' AND ( devName='5#皮带运输机' OR devName='5#皮带运输机电机' ) AND date(uploadResultTime) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ORDER BY COMPLETE_TM DESC
